CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 12, 1961, p. 3, reads: "JUNIOR MOTHERS CABARET - The fashionable Junior Mothers Club has gathered this dazzling array of talent for its second annual 'Smart Affairs Revue,' which will be held on Sept. 3, at the Greater Pittsburgh Airport's Horizon Room...Center: Dance team of Yvonne Kemp and Mike Malone....Contact any Junior Mother for ticket."
TitMainTitle: Yvonne Jones Kemp wearing hat with feather and striped shorts dance costume, and Mike Malone wearing bowler hat, posed in interior with alternating block patterned floor and landscape picture, for Junior Mothers cabaret event
